divs: sighting detailsat 1:40am on 09\06\01 while looking out my window,i noticed a brilliantly glowing sphere which had three small blinking lightsbehind it in a triangle shape. i raised the window because i couldnt beleive myeyes. as it passed over my house i went out onto my front porch and watched itgo to the south. it sounded like a jet but was traveling sort of slow. at firsti thought it was a meteor,but it had no trail and that is what got me towatching it. if this was a jet it is something very new.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Burrillville
There were no other sightings in Burrillville on or around September 7th 2001
Summary: brilliant yellow-white ball flew over house
